title: Wear Expense Manager
summary: Log your expenses from the comfort of your Android Wear smartwatch
developerAddress:
Aeus Tech, Inc.
2nd Floor, Emmanuel Business Center,
Sen. Benigno Aquino Avenue, Diversion Road., Iloilo City
description: Wear Expense Manager simplifies the need of logging your expenses, all from the comfort of your own wrist.+ At-a-glance Expense Tracking (Additional features requires a one-time In-App Purchase)+ Fast dial-logging exclusively designed for Android Wear+ Track your History seamlessly on your watch or phone+ Set custom Budget for each Expense Category+ View Monthly StatisticsCOMPATIBLE ANDROID WEAR DEVICES:Samsung Gear Live, LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Sony Smartwatch 3, Asus ZenWatch and/or Moto 360 running Android 4.3 or higherDesigned / Developed by AEUS TECH Inc. Say hello at: info@aeustech.comSeekArc Copyright (c) 2013 Triggertrap Ltd
descriptionHTML:
Wear Expense Manager simplifies the need of logging your expenses, all from the comfort of your own wrist.


+ At-a-glance Expense Tracking (Additional features requires a one-time In-App Purchase)

+ Fast dial-logging exclusively designed for Android Wear

+ Track your History seamlessly on your watch or phone

+ Set custom Budget for each Expense Category

+ View Monthly Statistics

COMPATIBLE ANDROID WEAR DEVICES:
Samsung Gear Live, LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Sony Smartwatch 3, Asus ZenWatch and/or Moto 360 running Android 4.3 or higher


Designed / Developed by AEUS TECH Inc. Say hello at: info@aeustech.com
SeekArc Copyright (c) 2013 Triggertrap Ltd
comments: Okay design, but a little weird Beeps loudly whenever you do something, which is incredibly bizarre and annoying. The phone app inexplicably hides the status bar.
Could be great It's on to something good but needs more work. Needs to be able to create categories, multiple accounts and currencies, etc
Almost Team, categories of expense. User should have the capability to add or edit categories. Otherwise, it's alright.
Great asthetic But what I really miss are overheads and custom categories.
Needs more work Should allow input from both watch as well mobile. Can be synced.
Great concept, well executed Handsome design that's easy to use.
